General.Name: Imagine Lithium Inc
General.Description: Imagine Lithium Inc., a junior mineral exploration company, acquires, explores, and evaluates mineral properties in North America. It has 100% interest in its flagship project the Jackpot Lithium property located in Thunder Bay, Ontario. The company was formerly known as Infinite Ore Corp. and changed its name to Imagine Lithium Inc. in February 2022. Imagine Lithium Inc. was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 789 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1H2
